markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Single Action" />command ([light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100))    **Effect** You plunge your weapon into darkness to return the light. Attempt a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check with a counteract level of 5 and a +19 counteract modifier to end a magical [darkness](/Traits.aspx?ID=39) effect whose area is within reach of the weapon.
name: command (light)
